name: here-to-there
title: Here to There
description: Open the active app path in a chosen target
author: Jason

commands.name: activeToTarget
commands.title: Here â†’ There
commands.subtitle: Take what's open 'here' and open it 'there'
commands.description: Choose a source and open it in a target

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
